Beautiful color and fit, and flattering design. Held up to tailoring the length as well.

I got dress dirty, without tag, looks like used before. I ordered a new dress and was expecting to get it, but I was absolutely disappointed with what I got. And what is most important that I don’t have time to get another dress

评论概述: Color; The brighter the color the more chemical.
评论详情: I hung the dress to see if The wrinkles would settle, Notice a disturbing odor coming from the dress. Hand washed it and hung it again to dry, 3 days later, Odor to kill..came back! Only advice I can say is to wash it one more time before wearing if it. ONE TIME USE, then throw it out. A one time purchase work for me.
Recibi el paquete cerrado pero el vestido usado y sucio, una falta de respeto pues estoy comprando algo nuevo, a precio de nuevo no se segunda mano ni usado

Fit was great color was perfect felt very nice got a lot of compliments on it
Love the color
This dress was very pretty! Worked great as a mother of bride dress! Soft and layed nicely. went all the way to the floor.
Good material Beautiful dress

I wore this dress to my son's wedding as the mother-of-the groom. It was a perfect fit, comfortable for the entire evening, Be-U-ti-FULL, conservative, classy, yet sexy! Great value as well!! A perfect 10!!
This gown is absolutely beautiful! It is very well-made and true to size. I purchased this to wear to a formal wedding and it's absolutely beautiful.

This is my second dress from Ever Pretty. The dresses usually run exact size and are great material. The dress is a little long even with heals, but I'm very happy with the fit, feel, and how it looks.

评论概述: Between a size fourteen and sixteen.
评论详情: I'm about 200 pounds.I also used a girdle.I think it was actually a very nice dress for the price.

This dress was just delivered today. As soon as I took it out of the package I noticed holes in the dress. I will be returning. Very disappointed. I ordered this same dress last year in a different color and it was beautiful!

Bought this in two colors and different sizes since postpartum and with nursing I wasn’t sure which would be more flattering. The size 12 was the best fit for me- just had to get it hemmed. I went with the smaller lilac color, size 12. Lovely dress, color as expected, however at the waist there was broken threads that I could fit a finger in and at the hem there where small nicks in the material. Disappointed that I didn’t realize until it was too late to exchange (didn’t have time to wait for the replacement). The other dress (dusty rose) had no issues, just too large (size 14) and not the right color for me.

We had to order a special size.  The directions on getting the right measurements were very clear a d easy to follow.  The dress came today and fits perfectly.  Quality is amazing.  We couldn’t be happier!

I bought this dress for my sons wedding.I had been very skeptical about buying a dress on Amazon but wasn't having any luck with the department stores in my area.I decided to take a chance and figured if it didn't work,I could always send it back.I was floored to see how beautiful it was and how well it fits.I am just having a few alterations but it's really beautiful and u love it!
Love how it fits me
Una de las mejores compra. Es hermoso ajusta perfectamente y disimula bastante. Yo estoy pasada de peso y este traje me hace sentir confiada. Gracias al vendedor. Lo recomiendo al 1000 x100

评论概述: Such a great company to work with.
评论详情: Got my dress. Didn’t fit how I wanted it to fit. The return was fast and easy. Got my other size so fast. thank you

Very beautiful dresses! I wore this for a wedding as a bridesmaid and they look beautiful! I would recommend to actually know your size or even size up if you have a bigger chest area or are bigger/ plus size because these dresses don’t stretch at all! However, I loved how it fit in all the right places and cinched my waist too. I bought a size 8 and that’s my regular size and fit wonderfully. I didn’t struggle at all. These dresses aren’t transparent either, so dont worry ladies! Overall, it’s a pretty flowy bridesmaid dress!

评论概述: Cute dress but fit & zipper off
评论详情: I loved this pattern and the design but when I got it the sizing was tight , I followed the chart and reviews it did fit but the zipper was VERY sticky and hard to actually move. Maybe cuz it was tight but still I had read the zipper quality was a concern on many of the peoples reviews. They were correct. I wanted to keep this dress but inevitably sent it back because I didn’t like the way the bunching was at the back with the zipper, there was a few stitching issues that made it sit odd. As seen in the pic. But the color was gorgeous and material light.

This dress was very pretty.  I liked the flutter sleeves and the ribbon around the waist.  The gathering at the bust was not for me.  I also was not a fan of the color because it was see through even while in the house and the wedding I am attending is outside.  Would need to buy a slip.  Otherwise it was a nice dress.
The dresses was too long and to much clevish shown Both were too big for us. I ordered royal blue and they were navy blue Please refund payment back to credit card
Everyone loved this dress

I love the fit and the feel of the dress. Unfortunately this is the second one I ordered for a wedding, I had to send back the first one as there were stains on the front, I just received this one and there is a stain on the front too. I don't have time to get another dress.
I wore this as a Maid of Honor Dress. Theme was Halloween so black worked perfectly! I’m very short and it was long and a little big for me top wise.
Por primera vez muy bien🤣😅

This dress was amazing. I wore it for my wedding. It was flattering, NOT see-through (I did not have to add a slip), was so easy to keep clean (a spot that I obtained from food during the night, just washed right out), was very comfortable. I got so many compliments on my beautiful dress!
Fit just as the sizing said must wear heels and I am 5'9" and 240 got sizing for size 20.
Not true to size hard to return, still waiting on refund
Very pretty dress for my son's wedding. Everyone said it was beautiful

Last minute purchase for a mother of the bride dress. Very low cut, so I cut a piece of matching fabric to use and attached to my bra.  Worked out perfect. I’m 5’7” and length was perfect with 2.5 in heels.
This dress arrived quickly and is exactly as described. It is true to size, comfortable and looks flattering!

Quality and color were much better than expected. Pleating is very pretty, satin (attached) sash was a nice touch.  It was just way too long for me (5ft) and I had other dress options for the wedding I’m attending so this one went back. But this really is a lovely dress.

Dress fits great.  The only thing is I'm 5'2" and it is very long plus I don't care for the train in the back of. the dress.  I will have it tailored to have the train taken off when I get the dress shortened.

I got this dress for my friend’s wedding and it was perfect. I did have to alter it and cut is shorter, but I know that will be the case when I orders it. I got a size 4 and fits perfectly. Highly recommended.

The bust sizing was a little loose on me, but nothing that an extra bra couldnt fix. Otherwise, I love this dress and have used it so much!
It’s so annoying when you order one size and get another size that you never ordered. Jezzzzz. The gown is beautiful and great quality

I needed a simple but elegant dress for my best friends “Prom Themed Birthday Party” I love this designer they never disappoint! What’s in the picture is exactly what you get! I got so many compliments and all I did was add some silver accessories and pinned up my braids! ❤️❤️❤️❤️
Beautiful,  soft fabric, and it fits perfectly because of the cut. Everyone loved it.
This dress is beautiful. Lays nicely against the body. Fit is accurate. The color is striking!
This dress looked like it was from the 1970s. Returned

评论概述: Was perfect for my son’s wedding

The dress is beautiful and well made. Fit was true to size. The color is wrong. I ordered dusty blue, the tag says dusty blue. But it’s more turquoise. Saw pictures of a customer with the correct dusty blue color dress. Maybe just an error at the manufacturer?

评论概述: Pretty Dress but Horrible Refund Process
评论详情: The heading says it all. Lovely dress, although it makes me look bigger chested than I really am. Cute design and color, maybe not the most flattering on my curvy figure at least. Getting my refund for the dresses being returned has been a nightmare! I had to file a complaint to receive my first partial refund since the seller never distributed during the time frame. And now on my last returned item of my entire purchase, it’s saying I “received my full refund” when my bank statement isn’t reflecting it. Such a joke.

The fit is great, length is perfect and doesn't need alterations. I'm 5'8", size 8-10 normally and ordered a 10 here. It could use a little more support in the bust (not quite enough for no bra unfortunately). Excited to wear it in my sister's wedding this year, the color is perfect and quality is exactly what you'd get from any other wedding shop but have to pay 2x the price.

Wore this as a bridesmaid dress this month and it was very comfortable and affordable. I feel the size chart was accurate and I'm glad I used it because I would normally get a much smaller sized dress. I'm 5'4, so it was long, but thankfully I did not have to have it altered since I found shoes tall enough to work with the length. It comes in a small bag, so definitely need to have it steamed to get the wrinkles out.
Wedding dress is beautiful, but it is too long for me. Also, I receive it day  too late, otherwise I would take it to a tailor to altar to fit me.
This is a beautiful dress, great quality, beautiful fit and gorgeous purple color

Perfect fit and great quality for the price.  Recommend you size up one size as they can run fitted
Wear it to a wedding  Got many compliments on the color and the way it fit. It is true to size.

Got this to wear for my daughter’s wedding and I loved it! Great quality for the price. I did have it hemmed, and I had it altered in the shoulders to be tighter, just because it was a little low in the chest for my liking. I knew I’d be doing a ton of set up and clean up for the wedding, so I didn’t want to rely on just clothing tape. But it was comfortable and beautiful. I really loved it.
Super slimming and so pretty! I had to return twice to find the right sizing, but it’s a gorgeous dress and for the price, you can’t beat it!
Exactly as described and perfect fit!!!  Absolutely stunning!!!

The dress fits perfectly. The color is a lovely deep green, and the fabric drapes nicely.  Sleeves are a really nice feature.  Very pleased.

评论概述: WARNING DO NOT ORDER FROM THIS COMPANY!!!!
评论详情: Why do i have to give a star COME ON!!!! I give no STARS!!! Orderd a dress did not fit sent it back by UPS . when UPS scanned the package the money was sent to my Amazon Account by my choice. This company has now charged me again for the dress claiming they have not recived it. Big lie. they have recived it. Now i have to go back to the UPS store and get the tracking number to make a claim to try and get my money back, Maybe, who knows? it has been a nighmare dealing with this comapny. you should not have to spend your days dealing with this. Once UPS scanned the return it was out of my hands!. and the dress was not cheap. but it was cheap made!
My wife absolutely loves the dress.  Ever pretty made her day and got her trust.  The dress fit well and it was good quality.  She is glad that she  purchased it.

I love it! The only negative thing I can say about this dress is that you are going to have to steam it when it arrives in a small package slightly balled up!  🙂 But the dress is made well, and fit as expected!
Four stars because zipper catches. The sleeves tend to fall down

This dress is lovely, looks very high quality and I really, really, really wanted it to fit.  Sadly it did not fit my huge chest (34 G).  OK it fit, but no one wants to see 4 inches of cleavage on the groom's mom.  For reference, I wear a 12 pant, but in dresses I need to size up to 14 occasionally.  I am 5'7" and weigh 168 pounds.  I ordered a 12 (way too small) and a size 14 which would have fit a woman with an average sized chest.  The material is a chiffon.  The color was a lovely dark grey/blue.  Quite honestly, it is a much prettier dress than the one I wore to my son's wedding, but the other one was more modest, so I had to go with that one.
I wore it in a wedding. Great quality for the price.

I received so many compliments on this dress. Being taller (6'), it's often harder to find dresses that are the right length. This one was perfect!  Things I liked: 1. The length. It settled above my feet. The only thing to be cognizant of, is going up stairs 🤣(I stepped my the dress then). 2. The fabric. It flows nicely when you walk, and it was not full of static. You also couldn't see through the bottom skirt. 3. The top portion was very flattering. It is low cut, but I was able to wear a camisole under it and no one was the wiser.  I truly felt comfortable in this dress, which was such a blessing. I would happily buy it again.

评论概述: Dress for my WEDDING, custom size too short!!! 😭
评论详情: The dress is nice. The custom sizing is okay. But its too short. I even added an extra inch and a half to the length so account for shoes. Its to short even barefoot. This is my WEDDING dress and I am absolutely heartbroken. The rest of the fit is good but the length. Also. The under layer slip is a good 6 inches shorter than the outer layer and it is VERY obvious. Very very very disappointed
